name: next_ts_nest_skeleton
author: Michael Shuff
description: A monorepo skeleton with Next.js frontend and NestJS backend

scripts.dev: npm run start:db && concurrently "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:backend"
scripts.dev:frontend: npm run clean:next && npm run dev --workspace=frontend
scripts.dev:backend: npm run start:db && npm run start:dev --workspace=backend
scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=frontend && npm run build --workspace=backend
scripts.start:backend: npm run start:db && npm run start:prod --workspace=backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.test: npm run test --workspace=frontend && npm run test --workspace=backend
